title: Amends the workers' compensation law definition of employee
summary: Amends the workers' compensation law definition of employee to exclude persons during a period of orientation or training when such persons are intending to become independent contractors.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2274

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. REILLY -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Labor

       AN  ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to the defi-
         nition of employee

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 4 of section 2 of the workers' compensation law
    2  is amended by adding a new closing paragraph to read as follows:
    3    NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THIS CHAPTER, THE TERM "EMPLOY-
    4  EE"  SHALL  NOT INCLUDE ANY   PERSON DURING ORIENTATION OR TRAINING WHEN
    5  SUCH PERSON IS INTENDING TO BECOME AN INDEPENDENT  CONTRACTOR.  FOR  THE
    6  PURPOSES OF THIS PARAGRAPH:
    7    (I)  "INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR" MEANS A SOLE PROPRIETORSHIP, PARTNERSHIP
    8  OR CORPORATION THAT PROVIDES GOODS OR SERVICES TO ANOTHER  ENTITY  UNDER
    9  THE TERMS SPECIFIED IN A CONTRACT;
   10    (II)  "ORIENTATION"  MEANS  A  PERIOD  OF  INTRODUCTION, AS TO GUIDE A
   11  PERSON IN ADJUSTING TO A NEW FIELD OF WORK; AND
   12    (III) "TRAINING" MEANS THE PERIOD OF A PERSON'S EDUCATION, INSTRUCTION
   13  AND/OR DEVELOPMENT IN A NEW FIELD OF WORK.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05401-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to the definition of employee
